metadata.title: CVE-2009-0195 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, CUPS 1.3.9, andprobably other products, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary codevia a PDF file with crafted JBIG2 symbol dictionary segments.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-0195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler68 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
poppler-utils - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
